_comment_start: RESONANT · GROWTH METRICS EXPORT — v1.0 | Aggregated · Read-only · Pitch-safe

meta.description: Aggregated growth metrics derived from intentional listening sessions over time.

methodology.growthDefinition: Growth is measured as relative change between the first and last active days.
methodology.momentumDefinition: Momentum reflects consistency across recent days, not isolated spikes.
methodology.sessionQualification: Only intentional listening sessions are counted.
methodology.timeStandard: All days are expressed in UTC (YYYY-MM-DD).

notes: This file contains no executable logic.
Metrics are derived from aggregated session data only.
Safe for sponsors, partners, and public sharing.
Designed to be backend-, BI-, and dashboard-compatible.
_comment_end: END OF FILE — RESONANT GROWTH METRICS · FREEZE LOCKED
